body: Oh, while I am commenting here, would you guys prefer a story like this one with civilian stuff and no powers/hero stuff? Or would you rather have her get in trouble with some villains while she does hero work? I will be doing a poll or something on reddit once I get the resources needed, but your input is welcomed!

I linked the artist's Patreon earlier, I tried contacting them to see if we can get a part 2 going, but they are not getting back to me...

So if you want to support the group and help me raise funds to hire an artist or pay the old artist if he gets back to me: https://www.subscribestar.com/lewd-logistics
Ooooh part 2 is gonna bee littt

Hi there! I am the one that had this made! For anyone reading this, you can support the artist here:

https://www.patreon.com/glocerio

I would say you can support the group, but due to the pandemic, our projects are on pause for now. A part 2 will come when things get more... stable
